00019 //ZoneConnectionClass - Holding zone connection info from tubes or bridges (probably used for pathfinding)
00020 struct ZoneConnectionClass
00021 {
00022         CellStruct      FromMapCoords;
00023         CellStruct      ToMapCoords;
00024         bool            unknown_bool_08;
00025         CellClass*      pCell;
00026 
00027         //need to define a == operator so it can be used in array classes
00028         bool operator==(ZoneConnectionClass tZoneConnection)
00029                 {
00030                         return (FromMapCoords == tZoneConnection.FromMapCoords &&
00031                                         ToMapCoords == tZoneConnection.ToMapCoords &&
00032                                         unknown_bool_08 == tZoneConnection.unknown_bool_08 &&
00033                                         pCell == tZoneConnection.pCell);
00034                 }
00035 };

00081         CellClass* GetCellAt(CellStruct* pMapCoords)
00082                 {
00083                         int n = (pMapCoords->Y << 9) + pMapCoords->X;
00084 
00085                         if((n >= 0 && n < MAX_CELLS) && Cells[n]) {
00086                                 // && && && && !!
00087                                 return Cells[n];
00088                         }
00089 
00090                         CellClass* pCell = InvalidCell();
00091 
00092                         pCell->set_MapCoords(pMapCoords);
00093                         return pCell;
00094                 }

00156 /*
00157  * these come in pairs - first the last argument is 0 and then 1
00158 
00159  * AircraftClass::Fire - reveal the target area to the owner (0,0,0,1,x)
00160  * AircraftClass::See - reveal shroud when on the ground (arg,arg,0,1,x), and fog always (0,0,1,(height < flightlevel/2),x)
00161  * AnimClass::AnimClass - reveal area to player if anim->Type = [General]DropZoneAnim= (radius = Rules->DropZoneRadius /256) (0,0,0,1,x)
00162  * BuildingClass::Place - reveal (r = 1) to player if this is ToTile and owned by player (0,0,0,1,x)
00163  * BuildingClass::Put - reveal (radius = this->Type->Sight ) to owner (0,0,0,1,x)
00164  * PsychicReveal launch - reveal to user (0,0,0,0,x)
00165  * ActionClass::RevealWaypoint - reveal RevealTriggerRadius= to player (0,0,0,1,x)
00166  * ActionClass::RevealZoneOfWaypoint - reveal (r = 2) to player (0,0,0,1,x)
00167  */

00169                 CoordStruct* Coords,
